description: Victoria Cocks (Co-writer, Director), Kristy Stark (Producer), Nick Batzias (Producer)
synopsis: The Apocalypse has come and gone; its survivors forming small communities for protection. Banished to the vast Wasteland, Isaac - a giant humanoid panda - sets out to find a young girl and reinstate his family into the Tribe of Legion.
title: Wastelander Panda: Exile
